   Revākhaṇḍa of the Vāyupurāṇa	RevAKaNxaH of Te VAyupurANa
   RKV adhyāya 1	RKV aDyAya 1
   śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ // RKV_1.1 //	SrI gaNeSAya namaH // RKV_1.1 //
   oṃ namaḥ śrīpuruṣottamāya /	om namaH SrI puruzottamAya /
   oṃ namaḥ śrīnarmadāyai /	om namaH SrI narmadAyE /
   oṃ namo hariharahiraṇyagarbhebhyo namo vyāsavālmīkiśukaparāśarebhyo namo	om namaH hari hara hiraNyagarBeByaH namaH vyAsa vAlmIki Suka parASareByaH namaH 
   gurugobrāhmaṇebhyaḥ /	guru go brAhmaNeByaH /
   oṃ majjanmātaṅgagaṇḍacyutamadamadirāmodamattālimālaṃ snānaiḥ	om majjat mAtaFga gaNxa cyuta mada madira Amoda matta ali mAlam snAnEH
   siddhāṅganānāṃ kucayugavigalat kuṅkumāsaṅgapiṅgam /	sidDa aFganAnAm kuca yuga vigalat kuFkuma AsaFga piFgam /
   sāyaṃ prātarmunīnāṃ kusumacayasamācchannatīrasthavṛkṣaṃ pāyādvo	sAyam prAtar munInAm kusuma caya samAcCanna tIra sTavRkzam pAyAt vaH 
   narmadāmbhaḥ karimakarakarākrāntarahaṃstaraṃgam // RKV_1.2 //	narmadA amBaH kari makara kara Akra anta rahan= taraMgam // RKV_1.2 //
   ubhayataṭapuṇyatīrthā prakṣālitasakalalalokaduritaughā /	uBaya tawa puNya tIrTA prakzAlita sa kalala loka durita oGAH /
   devamunimanujavandyā haratu sadā narmadā duritam // RKV_1.3 //	deva muni manuja vandyA haratu sadA narmadA duritam // RKV_1.3 //
   nāśayatu duritamakhilaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavacca bhuvi bhavinām /	nASayatu duritam aKilam BUtam Bavyam Bavat ca Buvi BavinAm /
   sakalapavitri tava sudhā puṇyajalā narmadā bhavati // RKV_1.4 //	sakala pavitri tava suDA puNya jalA narmadA Bavati // RKV_1.4 //
   taṭapulinaṃ śivadevā yasyā yatayo 'pi kāmayante vā /	tawa pulinam Siva devAH yasyAH yatayaH api kAmayante vA /
   muninivahavihitasevā śivāya mama jāyatāṃ revā // RKV_1.5 //	muni nivaha vihita sevA SivAya mama jAyatAm revA // RKV_1.5 //
   nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtvā naraṃ caiva narottamam /	nArAyaNam namaskRtvA naram ca eva narottamam /
   devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // RKV_1.6 //	devIm sarasvatIm vyAsam tatas jayam udIrayet // RKV_1.6 //
   naimiṣe puṇyanilaye nānāṛṣiniṣevite /	nEmize puNya nilaye nAnA Rzi nizevite /
   śaunakaḥ satramāsīnaḥ sūta papraccha vistarāt // RKV_1.7 //	SOnakaH satram AsInaH sUta papracCa vistarAt // RKV_1.7 //
   manye 'haṃ dharmanaipuṇyaṃ tvayi sūta sadārcitam /	manye aham Darma nEpuNyam tvayi sUta sadA arcitam /
   puṇyāmṛtakathāvaktā vyāsasaśiṣyastvameva hi // RKV_1.8 //	puNya amRta kaTA vaktAH vyAsa sa SizyaH tvam eva hi // RKV_1.8 //
   atastvāṃ paripṛcchāmi dharmatīrthāśrayaṃ kave /	atas tvAm paripRcCAmi Darma tIrTa ASrayam kave /
   bahūni santi tīrthāni bahuśo me śrutāni ca // RKV_1.9 //	bahUni santi tIrTAni bahuSas me SrutAni ca // RKV_1.9 //
   śrutā divyanadī brāhmī tathā viṣṇunadī mayā /	SrutA divya nadI brAhmI taTA vizNu nadI mayA /
   tṛtīyā na mayā kvāpi śrutā raudrī saridvarā // RKV_1.10 //	tRtIyA na mayA kvApi SrutA rOdrI sarit varAH // RKV_1.10 //
   tāṃ vedagarbhāṃ vikhyātāṃ vibudhaughābhivanditām /	tAm veda garBAm viKyAtAm vibuDa oGa aBivanditAm /
   vada me tvaṃ mahāprājña tīrthapūgapariṣkṛtām // RKV_1.11 //	vada me tvam mahA prAjQa tIrTa pUga parizkRtAm // RKV_1.11 //
   kaṃ deśam āśritā revā kathaṃ śrīrudrasaṃbhavā /	kam deSam ASritA revA kaTam SrI rudra saMBavAH /
   tatsaṃśritāni tīrthāni yāni tāni vadasva me // RKV_1.12 //	tad saMSritAni tIrTAni yAni tAni vadasva me // RKV_1.12 //
   sūta uvāca:	sUtaH uvAca:
   sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ kulapate caritraṃ narmadāśritam /	sADu pRzwam kula pate caritram narmadA ASritam /
   citraṃ pavitraṃ doṣaghnaṃ śrutamuktaṃ ca sattama // RKV_1.13 //	citram pavitram doza Gnam Srutam uktam ca sattamaH // RKV_1.13 //
   vedopavedavedāṅgādīnyabhivyasya pūritaḥ /	veda upaveda vedAFga AdIni aBivyasya pUritaH /
   aṣṭādaśapurāṇānāṃ vaktā satyavatīsutaḥ // RKV_1.14 //	azwAdaSa purANAnAm vaktA satyavatI sutaH // RKV_1.14 //
   taṃ namaskṛtya vakṣyāmi purāṇāni yathākramam /	tam namaskRtya vakzyAmi purANAni yaTAkramam /
   yeṣām abhivyāharaṇād abhivṛddhir vṛṣāyuṣoḥ // RKV_1.15 //	yezAm aBivyAharaNAt aBivRdDiH vRza AyuzoH // RKV_1.15 //
   śrutiḥ smṛtiśca viprāṇāṃ cakṣuṣī parikīrtite /	SrutiH smRtiH ca viprANAm cakzuzI parikIrtite /
   kāṇastatraikayā hīno dvābhyāmandhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // RKV_1.16 //	kANaH tatra ekayA hInaH dvAByAm anDaH prakIrtitaH // RKV_1.16 //
   śrutismṛtipurāṇāni viduṣāṃ locanatrayam /	Sruti smRti purANAni viduzAm locana trayam /
   yastribhirnayanaiḥ paśyet so 'ṃśo māheśvaro mataḥ // RKV_1.17 //	yaH triBiH nayanEH paSyet saH aMSaH mAheSvaraH mataH // RKV_1.17 //
   ātmano vedavidyā ca īśvareṇa vinirmitā /	AtmanaH veda vidyA ca ISvareNa vinirmitA /
   śaunakīyā ca paurāṇī dharmaśāstrātmikā ca yā // RKV_1.18 //	SOnakIyA ca pOrANI Darma SAstra AtmikA ca yAH // RKV_1.18 //
   tisro vidyā imā mukhyāḥ sarvaśāstravinirṇaye /	tisraH vidyAH imAH muKyAH sarva SAstra vinirNaye /
   purāṇaṃ pañcamo veda iti brahmānuśāsanam // RKV_1.19 //	purANam paQcamaH vedaH iti brahma anuSAsanam // RKV_1.19 //
   yo na veda purāṇaṃ hi na sa vedātra kiṃcana /	yaH na veda purANam hi na sa veda atra kiMcana /
   katamaḥ sa hi dharmo 'sti kiṃ vā jñānaṃ tathāvidham // RKV_1.20 //	katamaH sa hi DarmaH asti kim vA jQAnam taTAviDam // RKV_1.20 //
   anyadvā tatkimatrāha purāṇe yanna dṛśyate /	anyat vA tat kim atra Aha purANe yat na dRSyate /
   vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ pūrvaṃ purāṇe nātra saṃśayaḥ // RKV_1.21 //	vedAH pratizWitAH pUrvam purANe na atra saMSayaH // RKV_1.21 //
   bibhetyalpaśrutādvedo māmayaṃ pratariṣyati /	biBeti alpa SrutAt vedaH mAm ayam pratarizyati /
   itihāsapurāṇaiśca kṛto'yaṃ niścayaḥ purā // RKV_1.22 //	itihAsa purANEH ca kRtaH ayam niScayaH purA // RKV_1.22 //
   ātmā purāṇaṃ vedānāṃ pṛthagaṃgāni tāni ṣaṭ /	AtmA purANam vedAnAm pRTak aMgAni tAni zaw /
   yacca dṛṣṭaṃ hi vedeṣu taddṛṣṭaṃ smṛtibhiḥ kila // RKV_1.23 //	yat ca dRzwam hi vedezu tat dRzwam smRtiBiH kila // RKV_1.23 //
   ubhābhyāṃ yattu dṛṣṭaṃ hi tatpurāṇeṣu gīyate /	uBAByAm yat tu dRzwam hi tad purANezu gIyate /
   purāṇaṃ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ prathamaṃ brahmaṇaḥ smṛtam // RKV_1.24 //	purANam sarva SAstrANAm praTamam brahmaNaH smRtam // RKV_1.24 //
   anantaraṃ ca vaktrebhyo vedāstasya vinirgatāḥ /	anantaram ca vaktreByaH vedAH tasya vinirgatAH /
   purāṇamekamevāsīd asmin kalpāntare mune // RKV_1.25 //	purANam ekam eva AsIt asmin kalpa antare mune // RKV_1.25 //
   trivargasādhanaṃ puṇyaṃ śatakoṭipravistaram /	trivarga sADanam puNyam Sata kowi pravistaram /
   smṛtvā jagāda ca munīnprati devaścaturmukhaḥ // RKV_1.26 //	smRtvA jagAda ca munIn prati devaH caturmuKaH // RKV_1.26 //
   pravṛttiḥ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ purāṇasyābhavattataḥ /	pravRttiH sarva SAstrANAm purANasya aBavat tatas /
   kālenāgrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā purāṇasya tato muniḥ // RKV_1.27 //	kAlena agrahaNam dRzwvA purANasya tatas muniH // RKV_1.27 //
   vyāsarūpaṃ vibhuḥ kṛtvā saṃharetsa yuge yuge /	vyAsa rUpam viBuH kRtvA saMharet sa yuge yuge /
   aṣṭalakṣapramāṇe tu dvāpare dvāpare sadā // RKV_1.28 //	azwa lakza pramANe tu dvApare dvApare sadA // RKV_1.28 //
   tadaṣṭādaśadhā kṛtvā bhūloke 'smin prabhāṣyate /	tat azwAdaSaDA kRtvA BU loke asmin praBAzyate /
   adyāpi devaloke tacchatakoṭipravistaram // RKV_1.29 //	adya api deva loke tat Sata kowi pravistaram // RKV_1.29 //
   tathātra caturlakṣaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa niveśitam /	taTA atra catur lakzam saMkzepeNa niveSitam /
   purāṇāni daśāṣṭau ca sāmprataṃ tadihocyate /	purANAni daSa azwO ca sAmpratam tat iha ucyate /
   nāmatastāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tvamṛṣisattama // RKV_1.30 //	nAmataH tAni vakzyAmi SRNu tvam Rzi sattamaH // RKV_1.30 //
   sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca /	sargaH ca pratisargaH ca vaMSaH manvantarANi ca /
   vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva purāṇaṃ pañcalakṣaṇam // RKV_1.31 //	vaMSAnucaritam ca eva purANam paQca lakzaNam // RKV_1.31 //
   brāhmaṃ purāṇaṃ tatrādyaṃ saṃhitāyāṃ vibhūṣitam /	brAhmam purANam tatra Adyam saMhitAyAm viBUzitam /
   ślokānāṃ daśasāhasraṃ nānāpuṇyakathāyutam // RKV_1.32 //	SlokAnAm daSa sAhasram nAnA puNya kaTA yutam // RKV_1.32 //
   pādmaṃ ca pañcapañcāśatsahasrāṇi nigadyate /	pAdmam ca paQca paQcASat sahasrANi nigadyate /
   tṛtīyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃnāma trayoviṃśatisaṃkhyayā // RKV_1.33 //	tRtIyam vEzNavaMnAma trayoviMSati saMKyayA // RKV_1.33 //
   caturthaṃ vāyunā proktaṃ vāyavīyamiti smṛtam /	caturTam vAyunA proktam vAyavIyam iti smRtam /
   śivabhaktisamāyogācchaivaṃ taccāparākhyayā // RKV_1.34 //	Siva Bakti samAyogAt SEvam tat ca apara AKyayA // RKV_1.34 //
   caturviṃśatisaṃkhyātaṃ sahasrāṇi tu śaunaka /	caturviMSati saMKyAtam sahasrANi tu SOnakaH /
   caturbhiḥ parvabhiḥ proktaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ pañcamaṃ tathā // RKV_1.35 //	caturBiH parvaBiH proktam Bavizyam paQcamam taTA // RKV_1.35 //
   caturdaśasahasrāṇi tathā pañca śatāni tat /	caturdaSa sahasrANi taTA paQca SatAni tat /
   mārkaṇḍaṃ navasāhasraṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tatparikīrtitam // RKV_1.36 //	mArkaNxam nava sAhasram zazWam tat parikIrtitam // RKV_1.36 //
   āgneyaṃ saptamaṃ proktaṃ sahasrāṇi tu ṣoḍaśa /	Agneyam saptamam proktam sahasrANi tu zoxaSa /
   aṣṭamaṃ nāradīyaṃ tu proktaṃ vai pañcaviṃśatiḥ // RKV_1.37 //	azwamam nAradIyam tu proktam vE paQcaviMSatiH // RKV_1.37 //
   navamaṃ bhagavannāma bhāgadvayavibhūṣitam /	navamam Bagavat nAma BAga dvaya viBUzitam /
   tadaṣṭādaśasāhasraṃ procyate granthasaṃkhyayā // RKV_1.38 //	tad azwAdaSa sAhasram procyate granTa saMKyayA // RKV_1.38 //
   daśamaṃ brahmavaivartaṃ tāvatsaṃkhyam ihocyate /	daSamam brahmavEvartam tAvat saMKyam iha ucyate /
   laiṅgamekādaśaṃ jñeyaṃ tathaikādaśasaṃkhyayā // RKV_1.39 //	lEFgam ekAdaSam jQeyam taTA ekAdaSa saMKyayA // RKV_1.39 //
   bhāgadvayaṃ viracitaṃ talliṅgamṛṣipuṃgava /	BAga dvayam viracitam tad liFgam Rzi puMgavaH /
   caturviṃśatisāhasraṃ vārāhaṃ dvādaśaṃ viduḥ // RKV_1.40 //	caturviMSati sAhasram vArAham dvAdaSam viduH // RKV_1.40 //
   vibhaktaṃ saptabhiḥ khaṇḍaiḥ skāndaṃ bhāgyavatāṃ vara /	viBaktam saptaBiH KaNxEH skAndam BAgyavatAm varaH /
   tadekāśītisāhasraṃ saṃkhyayā vai nirūpitam // RKV_1.41 //	tad ekASIti sAhasram saMKyayA vE nirUpitam // RKV_1.41 //
   tatastu vāmanaṃ nāma caturdaśatamaṃ smṛtam /	tatas tu vAmanam nAma caturdaSatamam smRtam /
   saṃkhyayā daśasāhasraṃ proktaṃ kulapate purā // RKV_1.42 //	saMKyayA daSa sAhasram proktam kula pate purA // RKV_1.42 //
   kaurmaṃ pañcadaśaṃ prāhur bhāgadvayavibhūṣitam /	kOrmam paQcadaSam prAhuH BAga dvaya viBUzitam /
   daśasaptasahasrāṇi purā sāṃkhyapate kalau // RKV_1.43 //	daSa sapta sahasrANi purA sAMKya pate kalO // RKV_1.43 //
   mātsyaṃ matsyena yatproktaṃ manave ṣoḍaśaṃ kramāt /	mAtsyam matsyena yat proktam manave zoxaSam kramAt /
   taccaturdaśasāhasraṃ saṃkhyayā vadatāṃ vara // RKV_1.44 //	tat caturdaSa sAhasram saMKyayA vadatAm varaH // RKV_1.44 //
   gāruḍaṃ saptadaśamaṃ smṛtaṃ caikonaviṃśatiḥ /	gAruxam saptadaSamam smRtam ca ekonaviMSatiH /
   aṣṭādaśaṃ tu brahmāṇḍaṃ bhāgadvayavibhūṣitam // RKV_1.45 //	azwAdaSam tu brahmANxam BAga dvaya viBUzitam // RKV_1.45 //
   tacca dvādaśasāhasraṃ śatamaṣṭasamanvitam /	tat ca dvAdaSa sAhasram Satam azwa samanvitam /
   tathaivopapurāṇāni yāni coktāni vedhasā // RKV_1.46 //	taTA eva upapurANAni yAni ca uktAni veDasA // RKV_1.46 //
   idaṃ brahmapurāṇasya sulabhaṃ sauramuttamam /	idam brahma purANasya sulaBam sOram uttamam /
   saṃhitādvayasaṃyuktaṃ puṇyaṃ śivakathāśrayam // RKV_1.47 //	saMhitA dvaya saMyuktam puNyam Siva kaTA ASrayam // RKV_1.47 //
   ādyā sanatkumāroktā dvitīyā sūryabhāṣitā /	AdyA sanatkumAra uktA dvitIyA sUrya BAzitAH /
   sanatkumāranāmnā hi tadvikhyātaṃ mahāmune // RKV_1.48 //	sanatkumAra nAmnA hi tat viKyAtam mahA mune // RKV_1.48 //
   dvitīyaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca purāṇe pādmasaṃjñite /	dvitIyam nArasiMham ca purANe pAdma saMjQite /
   śaukeyaṃ hi tṛtīyaṃ tu purāṇe vaiṣṇave matam // RKV_1.49 //	SOkeyam hi tRtIyam tu purANe vEzNave matam // RKV_1.49 //
   bārhaspatyaṃ caturthaṃ ca vāyavyaṃ saṃmataṃ sadā /	bArhaspatyam caturTam ca vAyavyam saMmatam sadA /
   daurvāsasaṃ pañcamaṃ ca smṛtaṃ bhāgavate sadā // RKV_1.50 //	dOrvAsasam paQcamam ca smRtam BAgavate sadA // RKV_1.50 //
   bhaviṣye nāradoktaṃ ca sūribhiḥ kathitaṃ purā /	Bavizye nArada uktam ca sUriBiH kaTitam purA /
   kāpilaṃ mānavaṃ caiva tathaivośanaseritam // RKV_1.51 //	kApilam mAnavam ca eva taTA eva uSanasA Iritam // RKV_1.51 //
   brahmāṇḍaṃ vāruṇaṃ cātha kālikādvayameva ca /	brahmANxam vAruNam ca aTa kAlikA dvayam eva ca /
   māheśvaraṃ tathā sāmbaṃ sauraṃ sarvārthasaṃcayam // RKV_1.52 //	mAheSvaram taTA sAmbam sOram sarva arTa saMcayam // RKV_1.52 //
   pārāśaraṃ bhāgavataṃ kaurmaṃ cāṣṭādaśaṃ kramāt /	pArASaram BAgavatam kOrmam ca azwAdaSam kramAt /
   etānyupapurāṇāni mayoktāni yathākramam // RKV_1.53 //	etAni upapurANAni mayA uktAni yaTAkramam // RKV_1.53 //
   purāṇasaṃhitāmetāṃ yaḥ paṭhedvā śṛṇoti ca /	purANa saMhitAm etAm yaH paWet vA SRNoti ca /
   so 'nantapuṇyabhāgī syānmṛto brahmapuraṃ vrajet // RKV_1.54 //	saH ananta puNya BAgI syAt mRtaH brahma puram vrajet // RKV_1.54 //
   || iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama	|| iti SrI skAnde mahApurANe ekASIti sAhasryAm saMhitAyAm paQcama
   āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe purāṇasaṃhitāvarṇanām prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||	Avantya KaNxe revAKaNxe purANa saMhitA varNanAm praTamaH aDyAyaH ||
   RKV adhyāya 2	RKV aDyAya 2
   sūta uvāca // RKV_2.1 //	sUtaH uvAca // RKV_2.1 //
   narmadāyāstu māhātmyaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt /	narmadAyAH tu mAhAtmyam kRzNadvEpAyanaH abravIt /
   tatte 'haṃ sampravakṣyāmi yattvayā paripṛcchitam // RKV_2.2 //	tat te aham sampravakzyAmi yat tvayA paripRcCitam // RKV_2.2 //
   vistaraṃ narmadāyāstu tīrthānāṃ munisattama /	vistaram narmadAyAH tu tIrTAnAm muni sattamaH /
   ko 'nyaḥ śakto 'sti vai vaktumṛte brahmāṇamīśvaram // RKV_2.3 //	kaH anyaH SaktaH asti vE vaktum Rte brahmANam ISvaram // RKV_2.3 //
   etameva purā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāñjanamejayaḥ /	etam eva purA praSnam pRzwavAn janamejayaH /
   vaiśaṃpāyanasaṃjñaṃ tu śiṣyaṃ dvaipāyanasya ha // RKV_2.4 //	vESaMpAyana saMjQam tu Sizyam dvEpAyanasya ha // RKV_2.4 //
   revātīrthāśritaṃ puṇyaṃ tatte vakṣyāmi śaunaka /	revA tIrTa ASritam puNyam tat te vakzyAmi SOnakaH /
   purā pārīkṣito rājā yajñādīkṣāsu dīkṣitaḥ // RKV_2.5 //	purA pArIkzitaH rAjA yajQa adIkzAsu dIkzitaH // RKV_2.5 //
   saṃbhṛte tu havirdravye vartamāneṣu karmasu /	saMBRte tu haviH dravye vartamAnezu karmasu /
   āsīneṣu dvijāgryeṣu hūyamāne hutāśane // RKV_2.6 //	AsInezu dvijAgryezu hUyamAne hutASane // RKV_2.6 //
   vartamānāsu sarvatra tathā dharmakathāsu ca /	vartamAnAsu sarvatra taTA Darma kaTAsu ca /
   śrūyamāṇe tathā śabde janairukte tvaharniśam // RKV_2.7 //	SrUyamANe taTA Sabde janEH ukte tu aharniSam // RKV_2.7 //

   śrī mārkaṇḍeya uvāca:	SrI mArkaNxeyaH uvAca:

   āścaryabhūtā lokasya sarvapāpakṣayaṃkarī // RKV_22.1 //	AScarya BUtA lokasya sarva pApa kzayaMkarI // RKV_22.1 //

   agniruvāca:	agniH uvAca:

   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:

   āhūtau viṣṇunā tau tu sakāśaṃ jagmatuḥ kṣaṇāt /	AhUtO vizNunA tO tu sakASam jagmatuH kzaNAt /

   dahyamānāstu te sarve śastrairagniṃ tvaveṣṭayan /	dahyamAnAH tu te sarve SastrEH agnim tu avezwayan /
   divyairagnyarkasaṅkāśaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // RKV_22.26 //	divyEH agni arka saFkASEH SataSas aTa sahasraSas // RKV_22.26 //

   jvālāmālākulaṃ sarvaṃ vāyunā nirmitaṃ tadā // RKV_22.27 //	jvAlA mAlA Akulam sarvam vAyunA nirmitam tadA // RKV_22.27 //

   tataḥ kumāramagniṃ tu narmadāputramavyayam /	tatas kumAram agnim tu narmadA putram avyayam /

   sthāpayāmāsa deveśaṃ tasmiṃs tīrthe vidhānataḥ /	sTApayAmAsa deveSam tasmin tIrTe viDAnataH /
   pattreśvaraṃ tu vikhyātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu bhārata // RKV_32.20 //	pattreSvaram tu viKyAtam trizu lokezu BArata // RKV_32.20 //
   indralokaṃ gataḥ śāpānmuktaḥ so 'pi nareśvara /	indra lokam gataH SApAt muktaH saH api nareSvara /
   hṛṣṭaḥ pramudito ramyaṃ jayaśabdādimaṅgalaiḥ // RKV_32.21 //	hRzwaH pramuditaH ramyam jaya Sabda Adi maFgalEH // RKV_32.21 //
   eṣa te kathitaḥ praśnaḥ pṛṣṭo yo vai yudhiṣṭhira /	eza te kaTitaH praSnaH pRzwaH yaH vE yuDizWira /
   tatra snānena caikena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // RKV_32.22 //	tatra snAnena ca ekena sarva pApEH pramucyate // RKV_32.22 //
   yastvarcayenmahādevaṃ tasmiṃstīrthe yudhiṣṭhira /	yaH tu arcayet mahAdevam tasmin= tIrTe yuDizWira /
   snātvābhyarcya pitḥn devān so 'śvamedhaphalaṃ labhet // RKV_32.23 //	snAtvA aByarcya pitHn devAn saH aSvameDa Palam laBet // RKV_32.23 //
   mṛto varṣaśataṃ sāgraṃ krīḍitvā ca śive pure /	mRtaH varza Satam sAgram krIxitvA ca Sive pure /
   rājā vā rājatulyo vā paścānmartyeṣu jāyate // RKV_32.24 //	rAjA vA rAja tulyaH vA paScAt martyezu jAyate // RKV_32.24 //
   vedavedāṅgatattvajño jīvecca śaradaḥ śatam /	veda vedAFga tattva jQaH jIvet ca SaradaH Satam /
   vyādhiśokavinirmuktaḥ punaḥ smarati tajjalam // RKV_32.25 //	vyADi Soka vinirmuktaH punar smarati tat jalam // RKV_32.25 //

   RKV adhyāya 33	RKV aDyAya 33

   RKV adhyāya 34	RKV aDyAya 34
   śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:	SrI mArkaNxeyaH uvAca:

   kīrtayāmi naraśreṣṭha yadi te śravaṇe matiḥ // RKV_34.1 //	kIrtayAmi nara SrezWa yadi te SravaNe matiH // RKV_34.1 //
   yudhiṣṭhira uvāca:	yuDizWiraH uvAca:
   etadāścaryamatulaṃ śrutvā tava mukhodgatam /	etat AScaryam atulam SrutvA tava muKa udgatam /
   vismayāddhṛṣṭaromāhaṃ jāto 'smi munisattama // RKV_34.2 //	vismayAt hRzwa roma aham jAtaH asmi muni sattamaH // RKV_34.2 //

   puruṣākāro bhagavānutāho tapasaḥ phalāt /	puruza AkAraH BagavAn uta aho tapasaH PalAt /
   kasya gotre samutpannaḥ kasya devo 'bhavad vaśī // RKV_34.4 //	kasya gotre samutpannaH kasya devaH aBavat vaSI // RKV_34.4 //
   śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:	SrI mArkaNxeyaH uvAca:
   kulikānvayasambhūto brāhmaṇo bhaktimāñchuciḥ /	kulikA anvaya samBUtaH brAhmaNaH BaktimAn SuciH /
   īkṣyāmīti raviṃ tatra tīrthe yātrākṛtodyamaḥ // RKV_34.5 //	IkzyAmi iti ravim tatra tIrTe yAtrA kRta udyamaH // RKV_34.5 //
   yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ nirāhāro gatodakaḥ /	yojanAnAm Satam sAgram nirAhAraH gata udakaH /

   tatrānnado yāti maheśalokamasaṃkhyavarṣāṇi na saṃśayo 'tra // RKV_41.27 //	tatra anna daH yAti maheSa lokam asaMKya varzANi na saMSayaH atra // RKV_41.27 //

   tasyaivānantaraṃ tāta jalamadhye vyavasthitam /	tasya eva anantaram tAta jala maDye vyavasTitam /
   luṅkeśvaram iti khyātaṃ surāsuranamaskṛtam // RKV_67.1 //	luFkeSvaram iti KyAtam sura asura namaskRtam // RKV_67.1 //
   idaṃ tīrthaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ nānāścaryaṃ mahītale /	idam tIrTam mahA puNyam nAnA AScaryam mahI tale /
   asya tīrthasya māhātmyam utpattiṃ śṛṇu bhārata // RKV_67.2 //	asya tIrTasya mAhAtmyam utpattim SRNu BArata // RKV_67.2 //
   āsītpurā mahāvīryo dānavo baladarpitaḥ /	AsIt purA mahA vIryaH dAnavaH bala darpitaH /
   kālapṛṣṭha iti khyātaḥ suto brahmasutasya ca // RKV_67.3 //	kAlapRzWaH iti KyAtaH sutaH brahma sutasya ca // RKV_67.3 //
   gaṅgātaṭaṃ samāśritya cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ /	gaFgA tawam samASritya cacAra vipulam tapaH /
   adhomukho 'pi saṃsthitvāpibaddhūmam aharniśam // RKV_67.4 //	aDomuKaH api saMsTitvA apibat DUmam aharniSam // RKV_67.4 //
   tataścānantaraṃ devastiṣṭhate hyumayā saha /	tatas ca anantaram devaH tizWate hi umayA saha /
   dṛṣṭvā taṃ pārvatī sā tu tapasyugre vyavasthitam // RKV_67.5 //	dRzwvA tam pArvatI sA tu tapasi ugre vyavasTitam // RKV_67.5 //
   paśya paśya mahādeva dhūmāśī tiṣṭhate naraḥ /	paSya paSya mahAdeva DUma ASI tizWate naraH /
   prasīda taṃ kuruṣvādya dehi śīghraṃ varaṃ vibho // RKV_67.6 //	prasIda tam kuruzva adya dehi SIGram varam viBo // RKV_67.6 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   yaduktaṃ vacanaṃ devi na tanme rocate priye /	yat uktam vacanam devi na tat me rocate priye /
   svakāryaṃ ca sadā cintyaṃ parakāryaṃ visarjayet // RKV_67.7 //	sva kAryam ca sadA cintyam para kAryam visarjayet // RKV_67.7 //
   mūrkhastrībālaśatrūṇāṃ yaśchandenānuvartate /	mUrKa strI bAla SatrUNAm yaH Candena anuvartate /
   vyasane patate ghore satyametadudīritam // RKV_67.8 //	vyasane patate Gore satyam etat udIritam // RKV_67.8 //
   devyuvāca:	devI uvAca:
   bhāryayābhyarthito bhartā kāraṇaṃ bahu bhāṣate /	BAryayA aByarTitaH BartA kAraNam bahu BAzate /
   laghutvaṃ yāti sā nārī evaṃ śāstreṣu paṭhyate // RKV_67.9 //	laGu tvam yAti sA nArI evam SAstrezu paWyate // RKV_67.9 //
   prāṇatyāgaṃ kariṣyāmi yadi māṃ tvaṃ na manyase /	prANatyAgam karizyAmi yadi mAm tvam na manyase /
   pārvatyā prerito devo gato 'sau dānavaṃ prati // RKV_67.10 //	pArvatyA preritaH devaH gataH asO dAnavam prati // RKV_67.10 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   kimarthaṃ pibase dhūmaṃ kimarthaṃ tapyase tapaḥ /	kimarTam pibase DUmam kim arTam tapyase tapaH /
   kiṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ nu santāpo vada kāryamabhīpsitam // RKV_67.11 //	kim duHKam kim nu santApaH vada kAryam aBIpsitam // RKV_67.11 //
   yuvā tvaṃ dṛśyase 'dyāpi varṣaviṃśatir eva ca /	yuvA tvam dRSyase adya api varza viMSatiH eva ca /
   tadācakṣva hi me sarvaṃ tapasaḥ kāraṇaṃ mahat // RKV_67.12 //	tat Acakzva hi me sarvam tapasaH kAraNam mahat // RKV_67.12 //
   dānava uvāca:	dAnavaH uvAca:
   acalā dīyatāṃ bhaktirmama sthairyaṃ tavopari /	acalA dIyatAm BaktiH mama sTEryam tava upari /
   aparaṃ varṣasāhasraṃ nirvighnaṃ me gataṃ vibho // RKV_67.13 //	aparam varza sAhasram nirviGnam me gatam viBo // RKV_67.13 //
   divasānāṃ sahasre dve pūrṇe tvattapasā mama // RKV_67.14 //	divasAnAm sahasre dve pUrNe tvad tapasA mama // RKV_67.14 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   yācayābhīpsitaṃ kāryaṃ tuṣṭo 'haṃ tava suvrata /	yAcaya aBIpsitam kAryam tuzwaH aham tava suvrata /
   devasya vacanaṃ śrutvā cintayāmāsa dānavaḥ // RKV_67.15 //	devasya vacanam SrutvA cintayAmAsa dAnavaH // RKV_67.15 //
   kiṃ nākaṃ yācayāmyadya kimadya sakalāṃ mahīm /	kim nAkam yAcayAmi adya kim adya sakalAm mahIm /
   evaṃ saṃcintayāmāsa kāmabāṇena pīḍitaḥ // RKV_67.16 //	evam saMcintayAmAsa kAma bANena pIxitaH // RKV_67.16 //
   dānava uvāca:	dAnavaH uvAca:
   yadi tuṣṭo 'si me deva varaṃ dāsyasi me prabho /	yadi tuzwaH asi me deva varam dAsyasi me praBo /
   saṅgrāmaistu na tuṣṭo 'haṃ balaṃ nāstīti kiṃcana // RKV_67.17 //	saFgrAmEH tu na tuzwaH aham balam na asti iti kiMcana // RKV_67.17 //
   yasya mūrdhanyahaṃ deva pāṇinā samupaspṛśe /	yasya mUrDani aham deva pANinA samupaspRSe /
   devadānavagandharvo bhasmasādyātu tatkṣaṇāt // RKV_67.18 //	deva dAnava ganDarvaH BasmasAt yAtu tad kzaNAt // RKV_67.18 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   yattvayā cintitaṃ kiṃcittatsarvaṃ saphalaṃ tava /	yat tvayA cintitam kiMcid tad sarvam saPalam tava /
   uttiṣṭha gaccha śīghraṃ tvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati dānava // RKV_67.19 //	uttizWa gacCa SIGram tvam Bavanam prati dAnavaH // RKV_67.19 //
   dānava uvāca:	dAnavaH uvAca:
   sthīyatāṃ devadeveśa yāvajjñāsyāmi te varam /	sTIyatAm devadeveSa yAvat jQAsyAmi te varam /
   yuṣmanmūrdhni nyase pāṇiṃ pratyayo me bhavedyathā // RKV_67.20 //	yuzmad mUrDni nyase pANim pratyayaH me Bavet yaTA // RKV_67.20 //
   tataścānantaraṃ devaścintayāno maheśvaraḥ /	tatas ca anantaram devaH cintayAnaH maheSvaraH /
   na skando na harirbrahmā yaḥ kāryeṣu kṣamo 'dhunā // RKV_67.21 //	na skandaH na hariH brahmA yaH kAryezu kzamaH aDunA // RKV_67.21 //
   jñātvā caivāpadaṃ prāptāṃ devaḥ prārthayate vṛṣam /	jQAtvA ca eva Apadam prAptAm devaH prArTayate vRzam /
   anena saha pāpena yudhyasva sāmprataṃ kṣaṇam // RKV_67.22 //	anena saha pApena yuDyasva sAmpratam kzaNam // RKV_67.22 //
   karaṃ prāsārayad daityo devaṃ mūrdhni kila spṛśet /	karam prAsArayat dEtyaH devam mUrDni kila spRSet /
   lāṅgūlenāhato daityo viṣaṇṇaḥ patito bhuvi // RKV_67.23 //	lAFgUlena AhataH dEtyaH vizaNNaH patitaH Buvi // RKV_67.23 //
   devastu dakṣiṇāmāśāṃ gataścaivomayā saha /	devaH tu dakziNAm ASAm gataH ca eva umayA saha /
   bhayabhīto nirīkṣeta grīvāṃ bhajya punaḥpunaḥ // RKV_67.24 //	Baya BItaH nirIkzeta grIvAm Bajya punar punar // RKV_67.24 //
   gate cādarśanaṃ deve yuyudhe vṛṣabheṇa saḥ /	gate ca adarSanam deve yuyuDe vRzaBeNa saH /
   dvāvetau balināṃ śreṣṭhau yuyudhāte mahābalau // RKV_67.25 //	dvO= etO balinAm SrezWO yuyuDAte mahA balO // RKV_67.25 //
   prahārair vajrasadṛśaiḥ kopena ghaṭikātrayam /	prahArEH vajra sadRSEH kopena GawikA trayam /
   pāṇibhyāṃ na spṛśed yo vai vṛṣabhasya śirastathā // RKV_67.26 //	pANiByAm na spRSet yaH vE vRzaBasya SiraH taTA // RKV_67.26 //
   hatvā lāṅgūlapātena āgato vṛṣabhastadā /	hatvA lAFgUla pAtena AgataH vRzaBaH tadA /
   utthitaścāpyasau daityo vrajate vṛṣapṛṣṭhataḥ // RKV_67.27 //	utTitaH ca api asO dEtyaH vrajate vRzapRzWataH // RKV_67.27 //
   vāyuvegena samprāpto yatra devo maheśvaraḥ /	vAyu vegena samprAptaH yatra devaH maheSvaraH /
   āgataṃ dānavaṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛṣo vacanamabravīt // RKV_67.28 //	Agatam dAnavam dRzwvA vRzaH vacanam abravIt // RKV_67.28 //
   āruhya pṛṣṭhe me deva śīghrameva hi gamyatām /	Aruhya pRzWe me deva SIGram eva hi gamyatAm /
   āruhya vṛṣabhaṃ devo jagāma comayā saha // RKV_67.29 //	Aruhya vRzaBam devaH jagAma ca umayA saha // RKV_67.29 //
   nākaṃ prāptas tato devo gataḥ śakrasya mandiram /	nAkam prAptaH tatas devaH gataH Sakrasya mandiram /
   nātyajaddevapṛṣṭhaṃ tu dānavo baladarpitaḥ // RKV_67.30 //	na atyajat deva pRzWam tu dAnavaH bala darpitaH // RKV_67.30 //
   indralokaṃ parityajya brahmalokaṃ gatastadā /	indra lokam parityajya brahma lokam gataH tadA /
   yatrayatra vrajeddevo bhayātsaha divaukasaiḥ // RKV_67.31 //	yatra yatra vrajet devaH BayAt saha divOkasEH // RKV_67.31 //
   apaśyattatra tatraiva pṛṣṭhe lagnaṃ tu dānavam /	apaSyat tatra tatra eva pRzWe lagnam tu dAnavam /
   sarvāṃl lokān bhramitvā tu devo vismayamāgataḥ // RKV_67.32 //	sarvAn lokAn BramitvA tu devaH vismayam AgataH // RKV_67.32 //
   na sthānaṃ vidyate kiṃcidyatra viśramyate kṣaṇam /	na sTAnam vidyate kiMcid yatra viSramyate kzaNam /
   devadānavayostatra yuddhaṃ jñātvā sudāruṇam // RKV_67.33 //	deva dAnavayoH tatra yudDam jQAtvA su dAruNam // RKV_67.33 //
   harṣitātmā munistatra ciraṃ nṛtyati nāradaḥ /	harzita AtmA muniH tatra ciram nRtyati nAradaH /
   dhanyo 'hamadya me janma jīvitaṃ ca sujīvitam // RKV_67.34 //	DanyaH aham adya me janma jIvitam ca su jIvitam // RKV_67.34 //
   mahāntaṃ ca kaliṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃtoṣaḥ paramo 'bhavat /	mahAntam ca kalim dRzwvA saMtozaH paramaH aBavat /
   devadānavayostatra yuddhaṃ tyaktvā ca nāradaḥ // RKV_67.35 //	deva dAnavayoH tatra yudDam tyaktvA ca nAradaH // RKV_67.35 //
   ājagāma tato vipro yatra devo maheśvaraḥ /	AjagAma tatas vipraH yatra devaH maheSvaraH /
   dṛṣṭvā devo 'tha taṃ vipraṃ pratipūjyābravīd idam // RKV_67.36 //	dRzwvA devaH aTa tam vipram pratipUjya abravIt idam // RKV_67.36 //
   bho nārada muniśreṣṭha jānīṣe keśavaṃ kvacit /	Bo nArada muni SrezWa jAnIze keSavam kvacid /
   gatvā tatra ca śīghraṃ tvaṃ keśavāya nivedaya // RKV_67.37 //	gatvA tatra ca SIGram tvam keSavAya nivedaya // RKV_67.37 //
   nārada uvāca:	nAradaH uvAca:
   devadānavasiddhānāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām /	deva dAnava sidDAnAm ganDarva uraga rakzasAm /
   sarveṣāmeva deveśo harate dhruvamāpadam // RKV_67.38 //	sarvezAm eva deveSaH harate Druvam Apadam // RKV_67.38 //
   asaṃbhāvyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ manasāpi na cintayet /	asaMBAvyam na vaktavyam manasA api na cintayet /
   īdṛśīṃ naiva budhyāmi āpadaṃ ca vibho tava // RKV_67.39 //	IdRSIm na eva buDyAmi Apadam ca viBo tava // RKV_67.39 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   gaccha nārada śīghraṃ tvaṃ yatra devo janārdanaḥ /	gacCa nArada SIGram tvam yatra devaH janArdanaH /
   viditaṃ ca tvayā sarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ dānavena tu // RKV_67.40 //	viditam ca tvayA sarvam yat kRtam dAnavena tu // RKV_67.40 //
   avadhyo dānavo hyeṣa sendrair api marudgaṇaiḥ /	avaDyaH dAnavaH hi eza sa indrEH api marut gaNEH /
   gatvā tu keśavaṃ devaṃ nivedaya mahāmune // RKV_67.41 //	gatvA tu keSavam devam nivedaya mahA mune // RKV_67.41 //
   nārada uvāca:	nAradaH uvAca:
   na tu gacchāmyahaṃ deva suptaḥ kṣīrodadhau sukhī /	na tu gacCAmi aham deva suptaH kzIrodaDO suKI /
   keśavaḥ preraṇe hyeṣāmādeśo dīyatāṃ prabho // RKV_67.42 //	keSavaH preraNe hi ezAm AdeSaH dIyatAm praBo // RKV_67.42 //
   mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā rājānaṃ ca tathā prabhum /	mAtrA svasrA duhitrA vA rAjAnam ca taTA praBum /
   guruṃ caivāditaḥ kṛtvā śayānaṃ na prabodhayet // RKV_67.43 //	gurum ca eva Aditas kRtvA SayAnam na praboDayet // RKV_67.43 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   yadi kvacid agāreṣu vahnirutpadyate mahān /	yadi kvacid agArezu vahniH utpadyate mahAn /
   nidhanaṃ yānti tatrasthā yad budhyer annasūrayaḥ // RKV_67.44 //	niDanam yAnti tatrasTAH yat buDyeH anna sUrayaH // RKV_67.44 //
   nārada uvāca:	nAradaH uvAca:
   śīghraṃ gaccha mahādeva ātmānaṃ rakṣa suprabho /	SIGram gacCa mahAdevaH AtmAnam rakza supraBaH /
   gacchāmyahaṃ na sandeho yatra devo janārdanaḥ // RKV_67.45 //	gacCAmi aham na sandehaH yatra devaH janArdanaH // RKV_67.45 //
   tato nandimahākālau stambhahastau bhayānakau /	tatas nandi mahAkAlO stamBa hastO BayAnakO /
   jaghnaturdānavaṃ tatra mudgarādibhirāyudhaiḥ // RKV_67.46 //	jaGnatuH dAnavam tatra mudgara AdiBiH AyuDEH // RKV_67.46 //
   trayo 'pi ca mahākāyāḥ saptatālapramāṇakāḥ /	trayaH api ca mahA kAyAH sapta tAla pramANakAH /
   na śamo jāyate teṣāṃ yudhyatāṃ ca parasparam // RKV_67.47 //	na SamaH jAyate tezAm yuDyatAm ca parasparam // RKV_67.47 //
   tataścānantaraṃ vipro 'gacchat taṃ keśavaṃ prati /	tatas ca anantaram vipraH agacCat tam keSavam prati /
   suptaṃ kṣīrārṇave 'paśyaccheṣaparyaṅkasaṃsthitam // RKV_67.48 //	suptam kzIrArNave apaSyat Seza paryaFka saMsTitam // RKV_67.48 //
   lakṣmyā pādayugaṃ gṛhya ūrūpari niveśitam /	lakzmyA pAda yugam gRhya Uru upari niveSitam /
   apsarogīyamānaṃ tu bhaktyānamya ca keśavam // RKV_67.49 //	apsaraH gIyamAnam tu BaktyA Anamya ca keSavam // RKV_67.49 //
   adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ ca sujīvitam /	adya me saPalam janma jIvitam ca su jIvitam /
   utthāpayasva deveśaṃ lakṣmi tvam aviśaṅkitā // RKV_67.50 //	utTApayasva deveSam lakzmi tvam aviSaFkitAH // RKV_67.50 //
   nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā padāṅguṣṭhaṃ vyamardayat /	nAradasya vacaH SrutvA pada aFguzWam vyamardayat /
   nāradastiṣṭhate dvāri uttiṣṭha madhusūdana // RKV_67.51 //	nAradaH tizWate dvAri uttizWa maDusUdanaH // RKV_67.51 //
   devo 'pi nāradaṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ harṣamupāgataḥ /	devaH api nAradam dRzwvA param harzam upAgataH /
   svāgataṃ tu muniśreṣṭha suprabhātādya śarvarī // RKV_67.52 //	svAgatam tu muni SrezWa su praBAtA adya SarvarI // RKV_67.52 //
   nārada uvāca:	nAradaH uvAca:
   adya me saphalaṃ deva prabhātaṃ tava darśanāt /	adya me saPalam deva praBAtam tava darSanAt /
   kuśalaṃ ca na devānāṃ śīghram uttiṣṭha gamyatām // RKV_67.53 //	kuSalam ca na devAnAm SIGram uttizWa gamyatAm // RKV_67.53 //
   śrīviṣṇuruvāca:	SrI vizNuH uvAca:
   brahmā cendraśca rudraśca ye cānye tu marudgaṇāḥ /	brahmA ca indraH ca rudraH ca ye ca anye tu marut gaNAH /
   āpadaḥ kāraṇaṃ yacca tatsamākhyātum arhasi // RKV_67.54 //	ApadaH kAraNam yat ca tat samAKyAtum arhasi // RKV_67.54 //
   nārada uvāca:	nAradaH uvAca:
   dānavena mahātīvraṃ tapastaptaṃ sudāruṇam /	dAnavena mahA tIvram tapaH taptam su dAruNam /
   rudreṇa ca varo datto bhasmatvaṃ manasepsitam // RKV_67.55 //	rudreNa ca varaH dattaH Basma tvam manasA Ipsitam // RKV_67.55 //
   varadānabalenaiva sa devaṃ hantum arhati /	vara dAna balena eva sa devam hantum arhati /
   īdṛśaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ jñātvā nīto devo 'maraiḥ saha // RKV_67.56 //	IdRSam cezwitam jQAtvA nItaH devaH amarEH saha // RKV_67.56 //
   nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā jagāma samunirhariḥ /	nAradasya vacaH SrutvA jagAma sa munirhariH /
   dṛṣṭvā devastamīśānaṃ gacchantaṃ diśamuttarām // RKV_67.57 //	dRzwvA devaH tam ISAnam gacCantam diSam uttarAm // RKV_67.57 //
   dṛṣṭvā devaṃ ca rudro 'tha pariṣvajya punaḥpunaḥ /	dRzwvA devam ca rudraH aTa parizvajya punar punar /
   namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ devaṃ ca madhusūdanaḥ // RKV_67.58 //	namaskRtya jagannATam devam ca maDusUdanaH // RKV_67.58 //
   viṣṇur uvāca:	vizNuH uvAca:
   bhayasya kāraṇaṃ deva kathyatāṃ ca maheśvara /	Bayasya kAraNam deva kaTyatAm ca maheSvara /
   devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ preṣayeyaṃ yamālayam // RKV_67.59 //	deva dAnava yakzANAm prezayeyam yama Alayam // RKV_67.59 //
   lalāṭe ca kṛto dharmo yuṣmākaṃ ca maheśvara /	lalAwe ca kRtaH DarmaH yuzmAkam ca maheSvara /
   chittvā śirastathāṅgāni indriyāṇi na saṃśayaḥ // RKV_67.60 //	CittvA SiraH taTA aFgAni indriyANi na saMSayaH // RKV_67.60 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   nāsti saukhyaṃ ca mūrkheṣu nāsti saukhyaṃ ca rogiṣu /	na asti sOKyam ca mUrKezu na asti sOKyam ca rogizu /
   parādhīnena saukhyaṃ tu strījite ca viśeṣataḥ // RKV_67.61 //	para aDInena sOKyam tu strI jite ca viSezataH // RKV_67.61 //
   strījitena mayā viṣṇo varo dattastu dānave /	strI jitena mayA vizNo varaH dattaH tu dAnave /
   yasya mūrdhni nyasetpāṇiṃ sa bhaved bhasmapuṃjavat // RKV_67.62 //	yasya mUrDni nyaset pANim sa Bavet Basma puMja vat // RKV_67.62 //
   ajeyaścāmaraścaiva mayā hyuktaḥ sa keśava /	ajeyaH ca amaraH ca eva mayA hi uktaH sa keSava /
   hantumicchati māṃ pāpa upāyastava vidyate // RKV_67.63 //	hantum icCati mAm pApaH upAyaH tava vidyate // RKV_67.63 //
   viṣṇuruvāca:	vizNuH uvAca:

   RKV adhyāya 75	RKV aDyAya 75

   narmadādakṣiṇe kūle tīrthaṃ paramaśobhanam /	narmadA dakziNe kUle tIrTam parama SoBanam /
   śaṅkhacūḍasya nāmnā vai prasiddhaṃ bhūmimaṇḍale // RKV_75.1 //	SaFKacUxasya nAmnA vE prasidDam BUmi maNxale // RKV_75.1 //
   śaṅkhacūḍaḥ svayaṃ tatra saṃsthitaḥ pāṇḍunandana /	SaFKacUxaH svayam tatra saMsTitaH pANxu nandana /
   vainateyabhayātpārtha sukhadanarmadātaṭe // RKV_75.2 //	vEnateya BayAt pArTa suKa da narmadA tawe // RKV_75.2 //
   tatra tīrthe tu yo bhaktyā śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ /	tatra tIrTe tu yaH BaktyA SuciH BUtvA samAhitaH /
   snāpayecchaṅkhacūḍaṃ tu kṣīrakṣaudreṇa sarpiṣā // RKV_75.3 //	snApayet SaFKacUxam tu kzIra kzOdreNa sarpizA // RKV_75.3 //
   rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kuryād devasyāgre narādhipa /	rAtrO jAgaraNam kuryAt devasya agre narADipa /
   dadhibhaktena sampūjya brāhmaṇāñchaṃsitavratān /	daDi Baktena sampUjya brAhmaNAn SaMsita vratAn /
   gopradāne dvijendro 'yaṃ sarvapāpakṣayaṃkaraḥ // RKV_75.4 //	go pradAne dvijendraH ayam sarva pApa kzayaMkaraH // RKV_75.4 //
   tasmiṃstīrthe tu yaḥ pārtha sarpadaṣṭaṃ pratarpayet /	tasmin= tIrTe tu yaH pArTa sarpa dazwam pratarpayet /
   sa yāti paramaṃ lokaṃ śaṅkarasya vaco yathā // RKV_75.5 //	sa yAti paramam lokam SaFkarasya vacaH yaTA // RKV_75.5 //
   || iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama	|| iti SrI skAnde mahApurANe ekASIti sAhasryAm saMhitAyAm paQcama
   āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe śaṅkhacūḍatīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma	Avantya KaNxe revAKaNxe SaFKacUxatIrTamAhAtmyavarNanam nAma
   pañcasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||	paQcasaptatitamaH aDyAyaH ||
   RKV adhyāya 76	RKV aDyAya 76
   śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:	SrI mArkaNxeyaH uvAca:
   tato gacchettu rājendra pāreśvaram anuttamam /	tatas gacCet tu rAja indra pAreSvaram anuttamam /
   parāśaro mahātmā vai narmadāyāstaṭe śubhe // RKV_76.1 //	parASaraH mahAtmA vE narmadAyAH tawe SuBe // RKV_76.1 //
   tapaścacāra vipulaṃ putrārthaṃ pāṇḍunandana /	tapaH cacAra vipulam putra arTam pANxu nandana /
   himavadduhitā tena gaurī nārāyaṇī nṛpa // RKV_76.2 //	himavat duhitA tena gOrI nArAyaNI nRpa // RKV_76.2 //
   toṣitā parayā bhaktyā narmadottarake taṭe /	tozitA parayA BaktyA narmadA uttarake tawe /
   tasya tuṣṭā mahādevī śaṅkarārdhāṅgadhāriṇī // RKV_76.3 //	tasya tuzwA mahAdevI SaFkara arDa aFga DAriNI // RKV_76.3 //
   bhobho ṛṣivara śreṣṭha tuṣṭāhaṃ tava bhaktitaḥ /	Bo Bo Rzi vara SrezWa tuzwA aham tava BaktitaH /
   varaṃ yācaya me vipra parāśara mahāmate // RKV_76.4 //	varam yAcaya me vipra parASara mahAmate // RKV_76.4 //
   parāśara uvāca:	parASaraH uvAca:
   parituṣṭāsi me devi yadi deyo varo mama /	parituzwA asi me devi yadi deyaH varaH mama /
   dehi putraṃ bhagavati satyaśaucaguṇānvitam // RKV_76.5 //	dehi putram Bagavati satya SOca guNa anvitam // RKV_76.5 //
   vedābhyasanaśīlaṃ hi sarvaśāstraviśāradam /	veda aByasana SIlam hi sarva SAstra viSAradam /
   tīrthe cātra bhaved devi sannidhānavareṇa tu // RKV_76.6 //	tIrTe ca atra Bavet devi sanniDAna vareNa tu // RKV_76.6 //
   lokopakārahetośca sthīyatāṃ girinandini /	loka upakAra hetoH ca sTIyatAm girinandini /
   parāśarābhidhānena narmadādakṣiṇe taṭe // RKV_76.7 //	parASara aBiDAnena narmadA dakziNe tawe // RKV_76.7 //
   śrīdevyuvāca:	SrI devI uvAca:
   evaṃ bhavatu te vipra tatraivāntaradhīyata /	evam Bavatu te vipra tatra eva antaraDIyata /
   parāśaro mahātmā vai sthāpayāmāsa pārvatīm // RKV_76.8 //	parASaraH mahAtmA vE sTApayAmAsa pArvatIm // RKV_76.8 //
   śaṅkaraṃ sthāpayāmāsa surāsuranamaskṛtam /	SaFkaram sTApayAmAsa sura asura namaskRtam /
   acchedyam apratarkyaṃ ca devānāṃ tu durāsadam // RKV_76.9 //	acCedyam apratarkyam ca devAnAm tu durAsadam // RKV_76.9 //
   parāśaro mahātmā vai kṛtārtho hyabhavan nṛpa // RKV_76.10 //	parASaraH mahAtmA vE kRtArTaH hi aBavat nRpa // RKV_76.10 //
   tatra tīrthe tu yo bhaktyā śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ /	tatra tIrTe tu yaH BaktyA SuciH prayata mAnasaH /
   stryathavā puruṣo vāpi kāmakrodhavivarjitaḥ // RKV_76.11 //	strI aTavA puruzaH vA api kAma kroDa vivarjitaH // RKV_76.11 //
   māghe caitre 'tha vaiśākhe śrāvaṇe nṛpanandana /	mAGe cEtre aTa vESAKe SrAvaNe nRpa nandana /
   māsi mārgaśire caiva śuklapakṣe tu sarvadā // RKV_76.12 //	mAsi mArgaSire ca eva Sukla pakze tu sarvadA // RKV_76.12 //
   tatra gatvā śubhe sthāne narmadādakṣiṇe taṭe // RKV_76.13 //	tatra gatvA SuBe sTAne narmadA dakziNe tawe // RKV_76.13 //
   upoṣya parayā bhaktyā vratam etat samācaret /	upozya parayA BaktyA vratam etat samAcaret /
   rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā dīpadānaṃ svaśaktitaḥ // RKV_76.14 //	rAtrO jAgaraNam kRtvA dIpa dAnam sva SaktitaH // RKV_76.14 //
   gītaṃ nṛtyaṃ tathā vādyaṃ kāmakrodhavivarjitaḥ /	gItam nRtyam taTA vAdyam kAma kroDa vivarjitaH /
   prabhāte vimale prāpte dvijāḥ pūjyāḥ svaśaktitaḥ // RKV_76.15 //	praBAte vimale prApte dvijAH pUjyAH sva SaktitaH // RKV_76.15 //
   sampūjya brāhmaṇān pārtha dhanadānahiraṇyataḥ /	sampUjya brAhmaNAn pArTa Dana dAna hiraNyataH /
   vastreṇa chatradānena śayyātāmbūlabhojanaiḥ // RKV_76.16 //	vastreNa Catra dAnena SayyA tAmbUla BojanEH // RKV_76.16 //
   prīṇayennarmadātīre brāhmaṇāñchaṃsitavratān /	prINayet narmadA tIre brAhmaNAn SaMsita vratAn /
   śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha āmaiḥ pakvairjalena ca // RKV_76.17 //	SrAdDam kAryam nRpa SrezWa AmEH pakvEH jalena ca // RKV_76.17 //
   strīṇāṃ caiva tu śūdrāṇām āmaśrāddhaṃ praśasyate /	strINAm ca eva tu SUdrANAm AmaSrAdDam praSasyate /
   āmaṃ caturguṇaṃ deyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yudhiṣṭhira // RKV_76.18 //	Amam caturguNam deyam brAhmaNAnAm yuDizWiraH // RKV_76.18 //
   vedoktena vidhānena dvijāḥ pūjyāḥ prayatnataḥ /	veda uktena viDAnena dvijAH pUjyAH prayatnataH /
   hastamātraiḥ kuśaiścaiva tilaiścaivākṣatairnṛpa // RKV_76.19 //	hasta mAtrEH kuSEH ca eva tilEH ca eva akzatEH nRpa // RKV_76.19 //
   viprā udaṅmukhāḥ kāryāḥ svayaṃ vai dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ /	viprAH udaFmuKAH kAryAH svayam vE dakziNAmuKaH /
   darbheṣu nikṣipedannamityuccārya dvijāgrataḥ // RKV_76.20 //	darBezu nikzipet annam iti uccArya dvijAgratas // RKV_76.20 //
   pretā yāntu pare loke tīrthasyāsya prabhāvataḥ /	pretAH yAntu pare loke tIrTasya asya praBAvataH /
   pāpaṃ me praśamaṃ yātu etu vṛddhiṃ śubhaṃ sadā // RKV_76.21 //	pApam me praSamam yAtu etu vRdDim SuBam sadA // RKV_76.21 //
   vṛddhiṃ yātu sadā vaṃśo jñātivargo dvijottama /	vRdDim yAtu sadA vaMSaH jQAti vargaH dvijottamaH /
   evamuccārya viprāya dānaṃ deyaṃ svaśaktitaḥ // RKV_76.22 //	evam uccArya viprAya dAnam deyam sva SaktitaH // RKV_76.22 //
   gobhūtisahiraṇyādi cānnaṃ vastraṃ svaśaktitaḥ /	go BUti sa hiraNya Adi ca annam vastram sva SaktitaH /
   dātavyaṃ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha pāreśvaravarāśrame // RKV_76.23 //	dAtavyam pANxava SrezWa pAra ISvara vara ASrame // RKV_76.23 //
   ye śṛṇvanti paraṃ bhaktyā mucyante sarvapātakaiḥ // RKV_76.24 //	ye SRNvanti param BaktyA mucyante sarva pAtakEH // RKV_76.24 //
   || iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama	|| iti SrI skAnde mahApurANe ekASIti sAhasryAm saMhitAyAm paQcama
   āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe pāreśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma	Avantya KaNxe revAKaNxe pAreSvaratIrTamAhAtmyavarNanam nAma
   ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||	zawsaptatitamaH aDyAyaH ||
   RKV adhyāya 77	RKV aDyAya 77
   śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:	SrI mArkaNxeyaH uvAca:
   bhīmeśvaraṃ tato gacchet sarvapāpakṣayaṃkaram /	BImeSvaram tatas gacCet sarva pApa kzayaMkaram /
   sevitaṃ ṛṣisaṅghaiśca bhīmavratadharaiḥ śubhaiḥ // RKV_77.1 //	sevitam Rzi saFGEH ca BIma vrata DarEH SuBEH // RKV_77.1 //
   tatra tīrthe tu yaḥ snātvā sopavāso jitendriyaḥ /	tatra tIrTe tu yaH snAtvA sa upavAsaH jita indriyaH /
   japed ekākṣaraṃ mantramūrdhvabāhurdivākare // RKV_77.2 //	japet eka akzaram mantram UrDvabAhuH divAkare // RKV_77.2 //
   tasya janmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati /	tasya janma arjitam pApam tad kzaNAt eva naSyati /
   saptajanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ gāyatryā naśyate dhruvam // RKV_77.3 //	sapta janma arjitam pApam gAyatryA naSyate Druvam // RKV_77.3 //
   daśabhir janmabhir jātaṃ śatena tu purā kṛtam /	daSaBiH janmaBiH jAtam Satena tu purA kRtam /
   sahasreṇa trijanmotthaṃ gāyatrī hanti kilbiṣam // RKV_77.4 //	sahasreNa tri janma utTam gAyatrI hanti kilbizam // RKV_77.4 //
   vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ vāpi jāpyaṃ japtaṃ nareśvara /	vEdikam lOkikam vA api jApyam japtam nareSvara /
   tatkṣaṇād dahate sarvaṃ tṛṇaṃ tu jvalano yathā // RKV_77.5 //	tad kzaNAt dahate sarvam tRNam tu jvalanaH yaTA // RKV_77.5 //
   na devabalamāśritya kadācit pāpam ācaret /	na deva balam ASritya kadAcid pApam Acaret /
   ajñānān naśyate kṣipraṃ nottaraṃ tu kadācana // RKV_77.6 //	ajQAnAt naSyate kzipram na uttaram tu kadAcana // RKV_77.6 //
   tatra tīrthe tu yo dānaṃ śaktim āśritya cācaret /	tatra tIrTe tu yaH dAnam Saktim ASritya ca Acaret /
   tadakṣayyaphalaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate pāṇḍunandana // RKV_77.7 //	tat akzayya Palam sarvam jAyate pANxu nandanaH // RKV_77.7 //
   || iti śrīskānde mahāpurāṇa ekāśītisāhasryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pañcama	|| iti SrI skAnde mahApurANe ekASIti sAhasryAm saMhitAyAm paQcama
   āvantyakhaṇḍe revākhaṇḍe bhīmeśvaratīrthamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma	Avantya KaNxe revAKaNxe BImeSvaratIrTamAhAtmyavarNanam nAma
   saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||	saptasaptatitamaH aDyAyaH ||
   RKV adhyāya 78	RKV aDyAya 78
   śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:	SrI mArkaNxeyaH uvAca:
   tato gacchettu rājendra naradeśvaramuttamam /	tatas gacCet tu rAja indra naradeSvaram uttamam /
   tīrthānāṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ nirmitaṃ nāradena tu // RKV_78.1 //	tIrTAnAm paramam tIrTam nirmitam nAradena tu // RKV_78.1 //
   yudhiṣṭhira uvāca:	yuDizWiraH uvAca:
   nāradena muniśreṣṭha kasmāttīrthaṃ vinirmitam /	nAradena muni SrezWa kasmAt tIrTam vinirmitam /
   etadākhyāhi me sarvaṃ prasanno yadi sattama // RKV_78.2 //	etat AKyAhi me sarvam prasannaH yadi sattamaH // RKV_78.2 //
   śrīmārkaṇḍeya uvāca:	SrI mArkaNxeyaH uvAca:
   parameṣṭhisutaḥ pārtha nārado munisattamaḥ /	paramezWi sutaH pArTa nAradaH muni sattamaH /
   revāyāścottare kūle tapastena purā kṛtam // RKV_78.3 //	revAyAH ca uttare kUle tapaH tena purA kRtam // RKV_78.3 //
   navanāḍīnirodhena kāṣṭhāvatyāṃ gatena ca /	nava nAxI niroDena kAzWAvatyAm gatena ca /
   toṣitaḥ paśubhartā vai nāradena yudhiṣṭhira // RKV_78.4 //	tozitaH paSu BartA vE nAradena yuDizWiraH // RKV_78.4 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   tuṣṭo 'haṃ tava viprendra yoginātha ayonija /	tuzwaH aham tava vipra indra yogi nATa ayonija /
   varaṃ prārthaya me vatsa yaste manasi vartate // RKV_78.5 //	varam prArTaya me vatsa yaH te manasi vartate // RKV_78.5 //
   nārada uvāca:	nAradaH uvAca:
   tvatprasādena me śambho yogaścaiva prasidhyatu /	tvad prasAdena me SamBo yogaH ca eva prasiDyatu /
   acalā te bhavedbhaktiḥ sarvakālaṃ mamaiva tu // RKV_78.6 //	acalA te Bavet BaktiH sarvakAlam mama eva tu // RKV_78.6 //
   svecchācārī bhave deva vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ /	svecCA AcArI Bave deva veda vedAFga pAragaH /
   trikālajño jagannātha gītajño 'haṃ sadā bhave // RKV_78.7 //	tri kAla jQaH jagannATa gIta jQaH aham sadA Bave // RKV_78.7 //
   dine dine yathā yuddhaṃ devadānavamānuṣaiḥ /	dine dine yaTA yudDam deva dAnava mAnuzEH /
   pātāle martyaloke vā svarge vāpi maheśvara // RKV_78.8 //	pAtAle martya loke vA svarge vA api maheSvaraH // RKV_78.8 //
   paśyeyaṃ tvatprasādena bhavantaṃ pārvatīṃ tathā /	paSyeyam tvad prasAdena Bavantam pArvatIm taTA /
   tīrthaṃ lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ sarvapāpakṣayaṃkaram // RKV_78.9 //	tIrTam lokezu viKyAtam sarva pApa kzayaMkaram // RKV_78.9 //
   īśvara uvāca:	ISvaraH uvAca:
   evaṃ nārada sarvaṃ tu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /	evam nArada sarvam tu Bavizyati na saMSayaH /
   cintitaṃ matprasādena sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // RKV_78.10 //	cintitam mad prasAdena siDyate na atra saMSayaH // RKV_78.10 //
   svecchācāro bhavervatsa svarge pātālagocare /	sva icCA AcAraH BaveH vatsa svarge pAtAla gocare /
   martye vā bhrama vai yoginna kenāpi nivāryase // RKV_78.11 //	martye vA Brama vE yogin na kena api nivAryase // RKV_78.11 //
   sapta svarāstrayo grāmā mūrcchanāścaikaviṃśatiḥ /	sapta svarAH trayaH grAmAH mUrcCanAH ca ekaviMSatiH /
   tānā ekonapañcāśatprasādānme tava dhruvam // RKV_78.12 //	tAnAH ekonapaQcASat prasAdAt me tava Druvam // RKV_78.12 //
   mama priyaṃkaraṃ divyaṃ nṛtyagītaṃ bhaviṣyati /	mama priyaMkaram divyam nRtya gItam Bavizyati /
   kaliṃ ca paśyase nityaṃ devadānavakinnaraiḥ // RKV_78.13 //	kalim ca paSyase nityam deva dAnava kinnarEH // RKV_78.13 //
   tvattīrthaṃ bhūtale puṇyaṃ matprasādād bhaviṣyati /	tvad tIrTam BU tale puNyam mad prasAdAt Bavizyati /
   vedavedāṅgatattvajño hyaśeṣajñānakovidaḥ /	veda vedAFga tattva jQaH hi aSeza jQAna kovidaH /
   ekastvamasi niḥsaṅgo matprasādena nārada // RKV_78.14 //	ekaH tvam asi niHsaFgaH mad prasAdena nArada // RKV_78.14 //
   ityuktvāntardadhe devo nāradastatra śūlinam /	iti uktvA antardaDe devaH nAradaH tatra SUlinam /
   sthāpayāmāsa rājendra sarvasattvopakārakam // RKV_78.15 //	sTApayAmAsa rAja indra sarva sattva upakArakam // RKV_78.15 //
   pṛthivyāmuttamaṃ tīrthaṃ nirmitaṃ nāradena tu /	pRTivyAm uttamam tIrTam nirmitam nAradena tu /
   tatra tīrthe nṛpaśreṣṭha yo gacchedvijitendriyaḥ // RKV_78.16 //	tatra tIrTe nRpa SrezWa yaH gacCet vijita indriyaH // RKV_78.16 //
   māsi bhādrapade pārtha kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśī /	mAsi BAdrapade pArTa kRzNa pakze caturdaSI /
   upoṣya parayā bhaktyā rātrau kurvīta jāgaram // RKV_78.17 //	upozya parayA BaktyA rAtrO kurvIta jAgaram // RKV_78.17 //
   chatraṃ tatra pradātavyaṃ brāhmaṇe śubhalakṣaṇe /	Catram tatra pradAtavyam brAhmaNe SuBa lakzaNe /
   śastreṇa tu hatā ye vai teṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ pradāpayet /	SastreNa tu hatAH ye vE tezAm SrAdDam pradApayet /
   te yānti paramaṃ lokaṃ piṇḍadānaprabhāvataḥ // RKV_78.18 //	te yAnti paramam lokam piNxa dAna praBAvataH // RKV_78.18 //
   kapilā tatra dātavyā pitḥn uddiśya bhārata /	kapilA tatra dAtavyA pitHn uddiSya BArata /
   ityuccārya dvije deyā yāntu te paramāṃ gatim // RKV_78.19 //	iti uccArya dvije deyAH yAntu te paramAm gatim // RKV_78.19 //
   asya śrāddhasya bhāvena brāhmaṇasya prasādataḥ /	asya SrAdDasya BAvena brAhmaNasya prasAdataH /
   narmadātoyabhāvena nyāyārjitadhanasya ca /	narmadA toya BAvena nyAya arjita Danasya ca /
   teṣāṃ caiva prabhāvena pretā yāntu parāṃ gatim // RKV_78.20 //	tezAm ca eva praBAvena pretAH yAntu parAm gatim // RKV_78.20 //
   ityuccārya dvije deyā dakṣiṇā ca svaśaktitaḥ /	iti uccArya dvije deyA dakziNA ca sva SaktitaH /
   haviṣyānnaṃ viśālākṣa dvijānāṃ caiva dāpayet // RKV_78.21 //	havizya annam viSAla akza dvijAnAm ca eva dApayet // RKV_78.21 //
   dīpaṃ bhaktyā pradātavyaṃ nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ ca kārayet /	dIpam BaktyA pradAtavyam nRtyam gItam ca kArayet /
   avāptaṃ tena vai sarvaṃ yaḥ karotīśvarālaye // RKV_78.22 //	avAptam tena vE sarvam yaH karoti ISvara Alaye // RKV_78.22 //
   sa yāti rudrasāṃnidhyam iti rudraḥ svayaṃ jagau /	sa yAti rudra sAMniDyam iti rudraH svayam jagO /
   vidyādānena caikena akṣayāṃ gatim āpnuyāt // RKV_78.23 //	vidyA dAnena ca ekena akzayAm gatim ApnuyAt // RKV_78.23 //

   māsopavāsaṃ yaḥ kuryāt tatra tīrthe nareśvara // RKV_156.22 //	mAsa upavAsam yaH kuryAt tatra tIrTe nareSvara // RKV_156.22 //

   ṛṇamocanatīrthe dve tathā skandeśvaradvayam /	RNamocana tIrTe dve taTA skandeSvara dvayam /

   etaddharmyamupākhyānaṃ sarvaśāstreṣvanuttamam /	etat Darmyam upAKyAnam sarva SAstrezu anuttamam /
   deśe vā maṇḍale vāpi nagare grāmamadhyataḥ // RKV_232.28 //	deSe vA maNxale vA api nagare grAma maDyatas // RKV_232.28 //
   gṛhe vā tiṣṭhate yasya likhitaṃ sārvavārṇikam /	gRhe vA tizWate yasya liKitam sArvavArNikam /
   sa brahmā sa śivaḥ sākṣātsa ca devo janārdanaḥ // RKV_232.29 //	sa brahmA sa SivaH sAkzAt sa ca devaH janArdanaH // RKV_232.29 //
   dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ mārge 'yaṃ devasevitaḥ /	Darma arTa kAma mokzANAm mArge ayam deva sevitaH /
   gurūṇāṃ ca guruḥ śāstraṃ paramaṃ siddhikāraṇam // RKV_232.30 //	gurUNAm ca guruH SAstram paramam sidDi kAraNam // RKV_232.30 //
   yaścedaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ purāṇaṃ devabhāṣitam /	yaH ca idam SRNuyAt nityam purANam deva BAzitam /
   brāhmaṇo vedavānbhūyātkṣatriyo vijayī bhavet // RKV_232.31 //	brAhmaNaH vedavAn BUyAt kzatriyaH vijayI Bavet // RKV_232.31 //
   dhanāḍhyo jāyate vaiśyaḥ śūdro vai dharmabhāg bhavet // RKV_232.32 //	Dana AXyaH jAyate vESyaH SUdraH vE Darma BAj Bavet // RKV_232.32 //
   saubhāgyasantatiṃ nārī śrutvaitatsamavāpnuyāt /	sOBAgya santatim nArI SrutvA etat samavApnuyAt /
   śriyaṃ saukhyaṃ svargavāsaṃ janma caivottame kule // RKV_232.33 //	Sriyam sOKyam svarga vAsam janma ca eva uttame kule // RKV_232.33 //
   rasabhedī kṛtaghnaśca svāmidhruṅ mitravañcakaḥ /	rasa BedI kRtaGnaH ca svAmiDruj mitravaQcakaH /
   goghnaśca garadaścaiva kanyāvikrayakārakaḥ // RKV_232.34 //	go GnaH ca garadaH ca eva kanyA vikraya kArakaH // RKV_232.34 //
   brahmaghnaśca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ /	brahma GnaH ca surApI ca steyI ca guru talpa gaH /
   narmadācaritaṃ śṛṇvaṃstāmabdaṃ yo 'bhiṣevate // RKV_232.35 //	narmadA caritam SRNvan= tAm abdam yaH aBizevate // RKV_232.35 //
   sarvapāpavinirmukto jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /	sarva pApa vinirmuktaH jAyate na atra saMSayaH /
   pākabhedī vṛthāpākī devabrāhmaṇanindakaḥ // RKV_232.36 //	pAka BedI vRTA pAkI deva brAhmaNa nindakaH // RKV_232.36 //
   parīvādī guroḥ pitroḥ sādhūnāṃ nṛpatestathā /	parIvAdI guroH pitroH sADUnAm nRpateH taTA /
   te 'pi śrutvā ca pāpebhyo mucyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // RKV_232.37 //	te api SrutvA ca pApeByaH mucyante na atra saMSayaH // RKV_232.37 //
   ye punarbhāvitātmānaḥ śastraṃ śṛṇvanti nityaśaḥ /	ye punar BAvitAtmAnaH Sastram SRNvanti nityaSas /
   pūjayanti ca tacchāstraṃ nārmadaṃ vastrabhūṣaṇaiḥ // RKV_232.38 //	pUjayanti ca tat SAstram nArmadam vastra BUzaNEH // RKV_232.38 //
   puṣpaiḥ phalaiś candanādyair bhojanair vividhair api /	puzpEH PalEH candana AdyEH BojanEH viviDEH api /
   śāstre 'sminpūjite devāḥ pūjitā guravastathā // RKV_232.39 //	SAstre asmin pUjite devAH pUjitAH guravaH taTA // RKV_232.39 //
   iha loke pare caiva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	iha loke pare ca eva na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   tasmātsarvaprayatnena gandhavastrādibhūṣaṇaiḥ // RKV_232.40 //	tasmAt sarva prayatnena ganDa vastra Adi BUzaNEH // RKV_232.40 //
   pūjayetparayā bhaktyā vācakaṃ śāstrameva ca /	pUjayet parayA BaktyA vAcakam SAstram eva ca /
   vedapāṭhaiśca yatpuṇyamagnihotraiśca pālitaiḥ // RKV_232.41 //	veda pAWEH ca yat puNyam agnihotrEH ca pAlitEH // RKV_232.41 //
   tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti narmadācarite śubhe /	tad Palam samavApnoti narmadA carite SuBe /
   kurukṣetre ca yatpuṇyaṃ prabhāse puṣkare tathā // RKV_232.42 //	kurukzetre ca yat puNyam praBAse puzkare taTA // RKV_232.42 //
   rudrāvarte gayāyāṃ ca vārāṇasyāṃ viśeṣataḥ /	rudra Avarte gayAyAm ca vArANasyAm viSezataH /
   gaṅgādvāre prayāge ca gaṅgāsāgarasaṅgame // RKV_232.43 //	gaFgAdvAre prayAge ca gaFgAsAgara saFgame // RKV_232.43 //
   evamādiṣu tīrtheṣu yatpuṇyaṃ jāyate nṛṇām /	evamAdizu tIrTezu yat puNyam jAyate nRNAm /
   narmadācaritaṃ śrutvā tatpuṇyaṃ sakalaṃ labhet // RKV_232.44 //	narmadA caritam SrutvA tat puNyam sakalam laBet // RKV_232.44 //
   ādimadhyāvasāneṣu narmadācaritaṃ śubham /	Adi maDya avasAnezu narmadA caritam SuBam /
   yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā śṛṇudhvaṃ tatphalaṃ mahat // RKV_232.45 //	yaH SRNoti naraH BaktyA SRNuDvam tat Palam mahat // RKV_232.45 //
   samāpya śivasaṃsthānaṃ devakanyāsamāvṛtaḥ /	samApya Siva saMsTAnam deva kanyA samAvRtaH /
   rudrasyānucaro bhūtvā śivena saha modate // RKV_232.46 //	rudrasya anucaraH BUtvA Sivena saha modate // RKV_232.46 //
   dharmākhyānamidaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvākhyāneṣvanuttamam /	Darma AKyAnam idam puNyam sarva AKyAnezu anuttamam /
   gṛhe 'pi paṭhyate yasya caturvarṇasya sattamāḥ // RKV_232.47 //	gRhe api paWyate yasya catur varNasya sattamAH // RKV_232.47 //
   dhanyaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ manye gṛhasthaṃ cāpi tatkulam /	Danyam tasya gRham manye gRhasTam ca api tad kulam /
   pustakaṃ pūjayedyastu narmadācaritasya tu // RKV_232.48 //	pustakam pUjayet yaH tu narmadA caritasya tu // RKV_232.48 //
   narmadā pūjitā tena bhagavāṃśca maheśvaraḥ /	narmadA pUjitA tena BagavAn= ca maheSvaraH /
   vācake pūjite tadvaddevāśca ṛṣayo 'rcitāḥ // RKV_232.49 //	vAcake pUjite tadvat devAH ca RzayaH arcitAH // RKV_232.49 //
   lekhayitvā ca sakalaṃ revācaritamuttamam /	leKayitvA ca sakalam revA caritam uttamam /
   bhūṣaṇaṃ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ yo dadāti dvijanmane // RKV_232.50 //	BUzaNam sarva SAstrANAm yaH dadAti dvijanmane // RKV_232.50 //
   narmadāsarvatīrtheṣu snānadānena yatphalam /	narmadA sarva tIrTezu snAna dAnena yat Palam /
   tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti sa naro nātra saṃśayaḥ // RKV_232.51 //	tad Palam samavApnoti sa naraH na atra saMSayaH // RKV_232.51 //
   etatpurāṇaṃ rudroktaṃ mahāpuṇyaphalapradam /	etat purANam rudra uktam mahA puNya Pala pradam /
   svargadaṃ putradaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ kīrttivardhanam // RKV_232.52 //	svarga dam putra dam Danyam yaSasyam kIrtti varDanam // RKV_232.52 //
   dharmyamāyuṣyamatulaṃ duḥkhaduḥsvapnanāśanam /	Darmyam Ayuzyam atulam duHKa duHsvapna nASanam /
   paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ cāpi sarvakāmārthasiddhidam // RKV_232.53 //	paWatAm SRNvatAm ca api sarva kAma arTa sidDi dam // RKV_232.53 //
   yatpradattamidaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ vācyate dvijaiḥ /	yat pradattam idam puNyam purANam vAcyate dvijEH /
   śivaloke sthitis tasya purāṇākṣaravatsarī // RKV_232.54 //	Siva loke sTitiH tasya purANa akzara vatsarI // RKV_232.54 //
   iti nigaditametannarmadāyāścaritraṃ pavanagaditamagryaṃ śarvavaktrādavāpya	iti nigaditam etat narmadAyAH caritram pavana gaditam agryam Sarva vaktrAt avApya
   tribhuvanajanavandyaṃ tvetadādau munīnāṃ kulapatipuratas tat sūtamukhyena	triBuvana jana vandyam tu etat AdO munInAm kula pati puratas tat sUta muKyena
   sādhu // RKV_232.55 //	sADu // RKV_232.55 //
